name: Mother'sDaySkill
0:
”Alexa, open mother's day and moms day”
”Alexa, start mother's day and mommy”
”Alexa, launch mother's day and mothers day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mother's day
des: Easy to use Mother's day skill. Surprise your mother by using this Alexa skill on Mother's day. Ask the Alexa skill for "mothers day", "mommy", or "moms day" and Alexa will give out a nice Mother's day message.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
